comments:
Found this in my log. We recently changed fSnippetListeners to be null when the 
editor is disposed, rather than an empty collection. It seems we caused an NPE:

!MESSAGE Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Mar 06, 2003 19:31:42.75
!MESSAGE Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable 
(java.lang.NullPointerException)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2316)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Synchronizer.runAsyncMessages
(Synchronizer.java:97)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runAsyncMessages(Display.java:1752)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:1487)

	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.run(Workbench.java:1251)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run
(InternalBootLoader.java:845)
	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:461)

	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Mar 06, 2003 19:31:42.85
!MESSAGE 
*** Stack trace of contained exception ***
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Mar 06, 2003 19:31:42.85
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.util.ArrayList.<init>(ArrayList.java:128)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.snippeteditor.JavaSnippetEditor$3.run

Easily fixed with a null check.
